name: Monster Factory (guihero)
description:
The hero has gone too far! Spawn monsters and build up your factory to stop him.

Gather monster coins to spawn stronger orcs and destroy the hero.

How to play:

Spawn orcs to get gold and power up your factory to produce monster coins.

Use your monster coins to buy and spawn stronger orcs.

Submission to "Finally Finish Something 2023". Made by guihero in the course of a month.

Thanks for playing!
